CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 12, 1959, pg. A3 reads: "Whiteside Rd. Committee - Club 12/13 of Whiteside Rd., thought it would be a good idea to hold a "Back-to-School Festival" for youngsters in community. Co-sponsoring the idea were: Ammon Recreation Chapter, Hill City, Kay Boys Club and Soho Community House.  Included on the committee were, first row, left to right: Harry Alexander, Ella Byrd, Rebecca Grandy, Catherine Lee, Beatrice Davidson, Janet Nicholson and Warner Dawson.  Back row: Elizabeth Farrar, Lydia Davis, Ann Sanford, Florene Adams, Sedora Griggs, Anna Hines and Virginia Thomas."Printed image flipped by Pittsburgh Courier
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Back-to-School Festival" committee members, from left, first row, Harry Alexander, Ella Byrd, Rebecca Grandy, Catherine Lee, Beatrice Davidson, Janet Nicholson, and Warner Dawson; back row: Elizabeth Farrar, Lydia Davis, Ann Sanford, Florene Adams, Sedora Griggs, Anna Hines, and Virginia Thomas, posed in front of a brick building
